What are Cloud-Native Applications?

With over 15 years helping startups, we aim to discover and deconstruct to break things down and build them better ; we use strength and simplicity to deliver enduring solutions.

  • One codebase, one application

    Cloud-native applications must always consist of a single codebase that is tracked in a version control system. A codebase is a soruce code repository or a set of repositories that share a common root.

  • API First

    API fist frees organizations from the waterfall, deliberately engineered system that follows a preplanned orchestration pattern, and allow products to evolve into organic, self-organizeing ecosystems that can grow to handle new and unforseen demands.

  • Dependency Management

    We process all the images you upload and take full advantage of modern cloud based storage to host them at blazing fast speeds.
